short_summary: Injectable Ciprofloxacin items for armed forces
description: The Strategic Medical Countermeasures Program has a requirement for injectable Ciprofloxacin.
full_summary:
**Ciprofloxacin Mini-Bag (400 mg/200 mL) Tender Announcement**
==============================

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01016639
-------------

**Publication Date:** December 9, 2022
------------

**Tender Closing Date:** January 3, 2023, 13:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
-------------

**Business Opportunity:**
The Department of National Defence, on behalf of the Canadian Forces Health Services Group, is seeking proposals for the procurement of injectable Ciprofloxacin (6505-21-920-8323) to treat Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) members exposed to bacterial biological warfare agents.

**Quantity:**
The initial order is for 10,080 mini-bags to be delivered by March 31, 2023, with options to purchase an additional 10,080 mini-bags per year for three (3) years to maintain a stockpile.

**Contract Period:**
The contract will commence upon contract award and terminate on March 31, 2026.

**Eligibility:**
This opportunity is open to suppliers who meet the requirements outlined in the tender documents. Prospective suppliers are invited to submit their proposals in either official language of Canada, English or French.

**Seminars:**
Procurement Assistance Canada offers free seminars to businesses interested in learning how to sell goods and services to the Government of Canada. Topics include an overview of the federal government contracting process, searching for opportunities on Buy and Sell - Tenders Website, bidding on opportunities, and registering in supplier databases.

**Notice:**
Canada retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. The full schedule of seminars can be found on the Buyandsell.gc.ca website, under Event Calendar.

**Attachments:**
Tender documents in English and French are available for download at the following links:
- English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/09/12dac90f9e37dc987531806b93599bad/w6369-23-a060a-ciprofloxacin_minibag-rfp_english.pdf
- French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/09/a37f93435011da2839c83cef6fac9e88/w6369-23-a060a-ciprofloxacin_minibag-rfp_french.pdf

**Contracting Entity:**
The contracting
